Package com.agaramtech.qualis.restcontroller

Class SamplePunchSiteController

java.lang.Object
com.agaramtech.qualis.restcontroller.SamplePunchSiteController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/samplepunchsite") public class SamplePunchSiteController extends Object
This controller is used to dispatch the input request to its relevant method to access the SamplePunchSite Service methods

  • Method Details

    • getSamplePunchSite

      @PostMapping("/getSamplePunchSite") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getSamplePunchSite(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> inputMap) throws Exception
      This method is used to retrieve list of available samplepunchsite(s).
      Parameters:
      inputMap - [Map] map object with userInfo [UserInfo] holding logged in samplepunchsite details and nmasterSiteCode [int] primary key of site object for which the list is to be fetched Input : {"userinfo":{nmastersitecode": -1}}
      Returns:
      response entity object holding response status and list of all samplepunchsites
      Throws:
      Exception - exception

    • createSamplePunchSite

      @PostMapping("/createSamplePunchSite") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> createSamplePunchSite(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> inputMap) throws Exception
      This method will is used to make a new entry to samplepunchsite table.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - map object holding params ( samplepunchsite [SamplePunchSite] object holding details to be added in samplepunchsite table, userinfo [UserInfo] holding logged in user details ) Input:{ "samplepunchsite": {"nsitecode":-1,"sprojecttypename":"test","nprojecttypecode":1,"nsamplepunchsitecode":null,"sproductname":"Excepient","nproductcode":1,"spunchdescription":"PunchDesc","ncode":1}, "userinfo":{ "activelanguagelist": ["en-US"], "isutcenabled": 4,"ndeptcode": -1,"ndeputyusercode": -1,"ndeputyuserrole": -1, "nformcode": 194,"nmastersitecode": -1,"nmodulecode": 76, "nreasoncode": 0,"nsitecode": 1,"ntimezonecode": -1,"ntranssitecode": 1,"nusercode": -1, "nuserrole": -1,"nusersitecode": -1,"sdatetimeformat": "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss", "sgmtoffset": "UTC +00:00","slanguagefilename": "Msg_en_US","slanguagename": "English", "slanguagetypecode": "en-US", "spgdatetimeformat": "dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi:ss", "spgsitedatetime": "dd/MM/yyyy HH24:mi:ss","sreason": "","ssitedate": "dd/MM/yyyy", "ssitedatetime": "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss"} }
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with string message as 'Already Exists' if the samplepunchsite already exists list of samplepunchsites along with the newly added samplepunchsite.
      Throws:
      Exception - exception

      @PostMapping("/deleteSamplePunchSite") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> deleteSamplePunchSite(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> inputMap) throws Exception
      This method is used to delete an entry in samplepunchsite table
      Parameters:

      Exception - exception
